Package killdrluckygame

Interface Player

All Known Implementing Classes:
ComputerControlledPlayer, HumanControlledPlayer
public interface Player
The Player interface represents a player in the game. It defines methods to retrieve and manipulate player information and actions.

  • Method Summary
